snippet: As the war drags on, some people of Syrian descent, from the United States and other Western countries, have traveled to Syria to help in the fight against President Bashar al-Assad.
abstract: Small but growing number of men of Syrian descent with Western passports are joining opposition forces as war has dragged on against forces of Pres Bashar al-Assad; their presence is not enough to shift the tide of battle, but they add determination and complexity to a bloody landscape where loyalties and ambitions are often unclear.
lead_paragraph: As the war drags on, some people of Syrian descent, from the United States and other Western countries, have traveled to Syria to help in the fight against President Bashar al-Assad.

headline.seo: Westerners With Syrian Ties Trickle In to Help Rebels
headline.main: Westerners With Roots in Syria Trickle In to Help Rebels
headline.print_headline: Westerners With Roots in Syria Trickle In to Help Rebels
